name: P256.KeyAgreement
desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing NIST P-256 elliptic curve Diffie Hellman (ECDH) key exchange.

items.name: struct P256.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
items.desc: A P-256 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: struct P256.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
items.desc: A P-256 public key used for key agreement.
